title: Google\Cloud\Container\V1\SetLocationsRequest
name: SetLocationsRequest
description:
SetLocationsRequest sets the locations of the cluster.

Generated from protobuf message google.container.v1.SetLocationsRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.project_id
params.description: Deprecated. The Google Developers Console project ID or project number. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.zone
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the Google Compute Engine zone in which the cluster resides. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.cluster_id
params.description: Deprecated. The name of the cluster to upgrade. This field has been deprecated and replaced by the name field.

params.name: data.locations
params.description: Required. The desired list of Google Compute Engine zones in which the cluster's nodes should be located. Changing the locations a cluster is in will result in nodes being either created or removed from the cluster, depending on whether locations are being added or removed. This list must always include the cluster's primary zone.

params.name: data.name
params.description: The name (project, location, cluster) of the cluster to set locations. Specified in the format projects/*/locations/*/clusters/*.

methods.name: getLocations
methods.description:
Required. The desired list of Google Compute Engine zones in which the cluster's nodes should be located. Changing the locations a cluster is in will result in nodes being either created or removed from the cluster, depending on whether locations are being added or removed.

This list must always include the cluster's primary zone.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string locations = 4 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];

This list must always include the cluster's primary zone.

Generated from protobuf field repeated string locations = 4 [(.google.api.field_behavior) = REQUIRED];
